body:
Hey fuys, I uploaded a YouTube video of me playing here ;) probally boring to most of you but if you want to watch here's the link, thanks ;).

https://youtu.be/9BONfeBYYrM
body_tagged:

title: Avicus YT Video.

replies.body:
Nice!! :)
You look like you get a lot of lagg though. Which recording software do you use?
replies.body_tagged:
Nice!! :)
You look like you get a lot of lagg though. Which recording software do you use?

replies.body: Maybe you could up the fps of the screen capture to help this problem? Or use your GPU to encode your video so that the cpu can give you more fps in game
replies.body_tagged: Maybe you could up the fps of the screen capture to help this problem? Or use your GPU to encode your video so that the cpu can give you more fps in game

replies.body: It's not that special just a simple free one, ice cream screen recorder though.
replies.body_tagged: It's not that special just a simple free one, ice cream screen recorder though.

reply_to.body:
Nice!! :)

reply_to.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Hmm okay. When it comes to making YouTube videos you have to make sure you have quality, so I'd look into ways to get your frame rate up otherwise people will get bored or frustrated with the framerate.

Just a tip from another youtuber :)
replies.body_tagged:
Hmm okay. When it comes to making YouTube videos you have to make sure you have quality, so I'd look into ways to get your frame rate up otherwise people will get bored or frustrated with the framerate.

reply_to.body: It's not that special just a simple free one, ice cream screen recorder though.
reply_to.body_tagged: It's not that special just a simple free one, ice cream screen recorder though.

replies.body:
Don't use 1.9, it's bad. Use 1.8.

Also, try to find some way not to lag. And use a better pack, Faithful is overused as hell (my opinion). The music is overused as well, try something from The Eden Project. Also, quality is 480p ;l. 

I know I'm asking for too much from a guy with, I'm guessing, not the best computer, but just trying to help out xP.

worth a shot :P
